overview: Tony and Jackson have been best friends since the Vietnam War. When Jackson lines up Tony with an attractive widow, he doesnâ€™t consider that the dynamics of his friendship with Tony could be drastically altered. Just when it looks like Tony might be tying the knot again with a woman with whom he has fallen completely in love, a past mistake rises out of the ashes to jeopardize the mutually exhilarating relationship.
title: Best Friends Recycled
